Body:
"""
        Test that a ClientConnectionNotOpen exception is raised when trying
        to retrieve a secret's attributes on an unopened client connection.
        """
client = ProxyKmipClient()
args = ['aaaaaaaa-1111-2222-3333-ffffffffffff', ['Name', 'Object Type']]
self.assertRaises(ClientConnectionNotOpen, client.get_attributes, *args)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
